channel.title: Problem with notepad client language
channel.description: hello , i have downloaded blank client and source from your private server client & source section, and inside the file "Blank Source" --> Client notepad , i have opened the client note pad to edit some things like the shop,skills etc.. and this is what i see , is there something wrong with my laptop that reads this language? because its supposed to be java language i suppose or is the mistake with the file that i've downloaded? [url=http://postimg.org/image/3lvrztx5r/][img]http://s11.postimg.org/3lvrztx5r/error_notepad.jpg[/img][/url]

item.title: Problem with notepad client language
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

When you ran DrJava it set the default program for .java files to the DrJava editor.
You can right click it and hit “edit” to make it come up in notepad, or you can hit open with > Select default program to pick what program will open the file by default.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with notepad client language
item.dc:creator: @leoshiro leoshiro
item.description:
@leoshiro wrote:

i opened the .class but the .java opens to me in DrJava program compiler is it fine if i open it there and edit porgrams there? thats what we do in our programming class … XD

PS: oh nvm i did open with notepad , it seems that my files changed to Drjava since i have been starting using it so it confused me which one is the notepad , thanks anyways ^^ helped me <3

Read full topic
